name: mcp-scan (Invariant Labs)
description: Static and dynamic scanning of MCP connections for vulnerabilities like prompt injection, tool poisoning, toxic flows. Includes proxy mode for runtime monitoring and guardrailing.

name: mcp-scanner (Cisco)
description: Scans MCP servers for potential threats using three engines: YARA rules, LLM-as-a-judge, and Cisco AI Defense API.

name: mcpserver-audit (CSA)
description: Checks if MCP servers are safe before use. Supports publishing findings to audit-db and vulnerability-db. Part of Cloud Security Alliance MCP Security initiative.

name: Enkrypt AI MCP Scan
description: Automated security scanning using agentic static analysis. Detects command injection, path traversal, prompt injection, code injection. Enterprise-focused with SOC 2/ISO 27001 alignment.

name: MCPScan.ai
description: Web-based MCP security scanner with LLM classifier for detecting tool poisoning attempts across MCP tool definitions.

name: Proximity
description: Open-source scanner that identifies prompts, tools, and resources exposed by MCP servers. Uses NOVA rule engine to check for prompt injection and jailbreak attempts.

name: MCP-Shield
description: Scans installed MCP servers for vulnerabilities like tool poisoning attacks, exfiltration channels, and cross-origin escalations.

name: mcp-security-scanner (AWS)
description: MCP server integrating Checkov, Semgrep, and Bandit for code security analysis. Enables AI coding assistants to automatically scan code snippets.

name: mcp-security-scanner (sidhpurwala)
description: Python-based penetration testing tool for MCP servers. Supports HTTP, stdio, SSE transports. Runs checks for auth, transport, tools, prompts, resources.

name: mcp-security-hub (FuzzingLabs)
description: Dockerized MCP servers for offensive security tools (Nmap, Ghidra, Nuclei, SQLMap, Hashcat). Enables AI assistants to perform security assessments.

name: mcp-for-security (cyproxio)
description: Collection of MCP servers for security tools like SQLMap, FFUF, NMAP, Masscan. Integrates security/pentesting into AI workflows.

name: mcp-vulnerability-scanner
description: MCP server for scanning IP addresses for vulnerabilities. Supports individual and bulk IP scanning.

name: Lasso MCP Gateway
description: Open-source security gateway for MCP. Triple-gate security pattern: AI layer (prompt filtering, PII detection), MCP layer (tool authorization, parameter validation), API layer (rate limiting, auth).

name: MintMCP Gateway
description: Enterprise MCP gateway with SOC2 Type II certification. One-click OAuth/SSO protection, real-time secret scanning, supports Claude/ChatGPT/Cursor.

name: TrueFoundry MCP Gateway
description: Centralized MCP server management with security and reliability features.

name: Pangea AI Guard
description: MCP proxy for AI security guardrails. Checks for malicious prompts, redacts sensitive info, audit logging, IP/domain reputation checks.

name: Acuvity
description: Runtime security for MCP with Rego policy suite to defend against tool poisoning and covert instructions in tool descriptions.

name: MCPVerified
description: Directory of MCP security tools with verification status.

name: Teleport MCP Security
description: Zero-trust infrastructure identity platform extended to MCP. Strict access control, least privilege, comprehensive audit trails.
